mapper.insert: insert into wordMemorize_CustomWord (wordNumber , word , yomigana , meaning , wordLevels , linkAddress , addedMemberID) values (wordMemorize_CustomWord_seq.nextVal , #{word} , #{yomigana} , #{meaning} , #{wordLevels} , #{linkAddress} , #{addedMemberID})
mapper.delete: delete from wordMemorize_CustomWord where word = #{word} and addedMemberID = #{addedMemberID}
mapper.select: select count(*) from wordMemorize_CustomWord where addedMemberID = #{addedMemberID} AND word = #{word}
select * from wordMemorize_Word where wordLevels = #{wordLevel} order by wordNumber
select * from wordMemorize_CustomWord where addedMemberID = #{addedMemberID} order by wordNumber

select * from wordMemorize_Word
where word like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
where yomigana like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
where meaning like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
where word like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or yomigana like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
order by wordNumber
